name: InlineHover

values.name: hover
values.comment:
Make a special element that can notice hover state.
```
main =
  ul []
    [ hover styles li [] [ text "Hello" ]
    , hover styles li [] [ text "World" ]
    ]

styles =
  [("background", "#abd")]
```
values.type: List ( String, String ) -> (List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg) -> List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg
